fileManagement.pdfScanVersion: This PDF file might be a scanned or image-based version, and text content cannot be extracted.

intent.continuationDescription: The user's intent is to continue creating, writing, or generating subsequent parts based on the provided long text content. For example: 'continue writing', 'what is the next chapter', 'continue this story'.
intent.analysisQaDescription: The user's intent is to conduct in-depth analysis, extract specific information, or answer a specific question based on the provided long text content. For example: 'extract key risks', 'compare chapter 3 and chapter 5', 'calculate gross margin'.
intent.summarizationDescription: The user's intent is to summarize, summarize, or extract key points from the provided long text content. This is a general, all-encompassing intent. For example: 'summarize', 'what does this article say', 'summarize the key points'.

ui.voiceInputTip: The voice input feature works best on the desktop version of Chrome. Other browsers may have compatibility issues.
ui.systemPromptHelp: Set a role or identity for the AI, e.g., You are a senior software engineer.
ui.systemPromptExample: e.g., You are an expert in classical Chinese poetry.
ui.temperatureHelp: A lower value makes the AI's responses more stable and rigorous; a higher value makes them more creative and diverse.
ui.guestUserDesc: Log in to unlock more features and permanently save your conversations.
ui.customApiKeyDesc: After configuring your own Google Gemini API Key, you will no longer be subject to the platform's daily call limits and will get faster response times.
ui.timelineFeatureDesc: When enabled, the floating button lets you jump to the previous or next model reply.
ui.timelineFloatingBallHint: When disabled, the floating button is hidden. This preference is saved to local data.
ui.mixedModeDesc: The system intelligently schedules both keys and auto-switches when one fails, effectively doubling throughput.
ui.singleModeDesc: The system uses KEY_ONE only; KEY_TWO is a backup used only if the first fails.
ui.todayUsageServerFallback: Today's Usage: {count} / 12 (One or more keys invalid)
ui.themePresetsDesc: Choose an overall interface style. You can still override the chat background below.
ui.appFontDesc: Choose a font you like. The change will apply to the entire application interface.
ui.languageDesc: Choose your preferred display language for the interface.
ui.changePasswordDesc: For your account's security, it is recommended to change your password regularly. The new password must be at least 6 characters long.
ui.changePasswordHint: If you signed up through a third-party provider and never created a password, create one here as a fallback for email login and security verification.
ui.securityTotpDesc: Use a 6-digit verification code to protect sign-ins.
ui.securityBackupDesc: Use if you lose access to your phone
ui.securityBackupModalWarning: Important: Each backup code can only be used once. After use, the code will be immediately invalidated. Please keep these codes safe. You will not be able to view them again after closing this dialog.
ui.loginMfaDesc: Your account has MFA enabled. Choose a method to continue.
ui.securityManualCodeLabel: Can't scan the QR code? Use the key below to add it manually.
ui.securityManualCodeLink: Can't scan? Enter the key manually
ui.securityDisableConfirmMessage: After turning off, sign-ins rely only on your password.
ui.securityBackupCodeUsed: The backup code you used has been invalidated. Each backup code can only be used once.
ui.currentPasswordOptional: Current password (leave blank if never set)
ui.limitReachedDesc: Guest trial limit has been reached. Please log in or try again tomorrow.
ui.pleaseCopyLinkManually: Please copy the following link manually:
ui.generationMayTake1to2Minutes: Generation may take 1-2 minutes, please wait patiently...
ui.tableTooLarge: The table is too large. Please view the full table on a desktop device.
ui.enableImageGeneration: It seems you want to generate an image. Please enable the [Image Gen] feature and send your request again.

donation.title: Support LittleAIBox
donation.message: If you find this app helpful, consider donating a small amount to support ongoing development and server costs. Thank you for your support!

privacyPolicy.welcome: Welcome to LittleAIBox! We understand the importance of your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy is intended to clearly explain how we collect, use, store, share, and protect your information when you use our services. Please read and fully understand this policy before using our services.
privacyPolicy.section1Desc: To provide and continuously optimize our services, we collect the following information necessary to implement product features, based on how you choose to use our service (as a guest or a registered user):
privacyPolicy.browserFingerprint: We use FingerprintJS technology to collect anonymous characteristics of your browser (such as browser type, screen resolution, time zone, etc.) to generate an anonymous guest ID. This is used to distinguish different browsers to enforce daily usage limits and prevent service abuse.
privacyPolicy.ipAddress: We collect your IP address primarily to associate multiple browser fingerprints from the same network, preventing abuse of our free service by frequently switching browsers.
privacyPolicy.chatHistory: Your chat conversation history as a guest is temporarily stored in your local browser's localStorage. We do not upload this history to our servers. This data will be lost when you clear your browser cache or switch devices.
privacyPolicy.usageStats: We associate your anonymous guest ID and IP address with your daily usage count. This data is temporarily stored on our servers (Cloudflare KV) and automatically expires and is deleted after 24 hours.
privacyPolicy.accountInfo: The email address, username (optional), and salted-and-hashed password you provide during registration. Your email will be used for account login, verification, and password reset.
privacyPolicy.profileInfo: You can optionally upload an avatar to personalize your account. The avatar file will be stored in our object storage service (Cloudflare R2).
privacyPolicy.chatAndAiParams: All your chat conversations (including titles, content, model selections, etc.) and your saved custom AI parameters (system prompt, temperature, etc.) will be securely stored in our server database (Cloudflare D1) so you can access them when you log in on different devices.
privacyPolicy.userUsageStats: We record your account's daily usage count to manage your service quota.
privacyPolicy.sessionInfo: After you log in, we store a session ID (sessionId) in your local browser's localStorage to verify your identity while you remain logged in.
privacyPolicy.oauthInfo: When you use social accounts such as Google or GitHub to log in, we collect and store your OAuth provider user ID, email address, username, avatar URL, as well as access tokens and refresh tokens used to maintain your login status. This information is securely stored in our database for account association and identity verification.
privacyPolicy.mfaInfo: If you enable multi-factor authentication, we store your TOTP (Time-based One-Time Password) secret (encrypted) and generated backup codes (hashed). This information is only used to enhance the security of your account, and we cannot access your plaintext secret or backup codes.
privacyPolicy.chatContent: The text you enter in the input box, and the full content of uploaded images and documents (such as PDF, Word, Excel, PPTX, etc.). This information will be sent to our backend and submitted to a third-party AI model to generate a response.
privacyPolicy.voiceInput: When you use the voice input feature on a supported desktop browser, your voice data is processed by your browser's or operating system's native speech recognition service and converted to text. Our servers only receive the converted text and do not process or store your original voice data.
privacyPolicy.customApiKey: If you provide your own API Keys (up to two can be configured) in the settings, we will store them securely in our database and use them to process your requests. You can choose to use these API Keys in mixed mode or single mode. We will only use these keys to make requests to the corresponding AI service providers and will not share them with any other third party.
privacyPolicy.provideService: To ensure you can log in, engage in AI conversations, view history, use custom parameters, and other core features.
privacyPolicy.securityPrevention: To limit daily usage via guest fingerprints and IP addresses, protecting the service from malicious bots and ensuring fair use for all users.
privacyPolicy.aiIntentAnalysis: In "Image Mode," to more accurately understand your intent (whether to generate a new image, modify an image, or have a normal chat), your current input and partial conversation history may be sent to an AI model for pre-judgment of intent.
privacyPolicy.ragProcessing: When you upload large documents or make complex analysis requests, the system initiates a "Retrieval-Augmented Generation" process. This includes: (1) intelligently chunking your document; (2) calling an AI to index and summarize each chunk; (3) retrieving the most relevant chunks based on your question; and (4) submitting these relevant chunks to the AI to generate a precise answer. This process involves sending your document content to the AI multiple times in small batches.
privacyPolicy.enhanceTimeliness: When you enable "Search Mode," we send your query to a third-party search service (Brave Search) to get web summaries, which are then provided as context to the AI model to generate answers based on the latest web information.
privacyPolicy.accountManagement: To process your registration, login, password change/reset, MFA setup and management, OAuth account association requests, and to send you verification emails when necessary.
privacyPolicy.sensitiveInfoWarning: We strongly advise you NOT to input, upload, or share any sensitive personal information in your conversations with the AI. This includes, but is not limited to:
privacyPolicy.financialInfo: Financial information (e.g., bank card numbers, bills, invoices)
privacyPolicy.identityInfo: Identity information (e.g., national ID numbers, passports, driver's licenses)
privacyPolicy.privateDocs: Contracts, letters, or legal documents containing personal privacy
privacyPolicy.anyPrivate: Any content you consider private or do not wish to be known by third parties
privacyPolicy.fileContentWarning: Please be aware that to generate a response, the entire content of your uploaded files will be extracted and sent to a third-party AI service provider (like Google). You are solely responsible for any potential risks arising from the sensitive information you choose to share.
privacyPolicy.section4Title: 4. AI Advanced Features and User Responsibility
privacyPolicy.aiAdvancedFeatures: We offer "AI Parameter Settings" and other advanced features (currently mainly on the desktop) that allow registered users to customize the AI's behavior and output style by setting parameters like System Prompt and Temperature. When you use these advanced features, you must understand and agree to the following:
privacyPolicy.userResponsibility: You are fully responsible for the parameters you set and the prompts you input.
privacyPolicy.legalCompliance: You must ensure that your configuration and use of the AI comply with all applicable laws and regulations in your country or region.
privacyPolicy.usageLimit: We offer registered users 3 free activations of advanced parameters within a 48-hour period. Each time you save the settings, it consumes one chance and starts a 48-hour validity period. After the chances are used up, you must wait for the cooldown period to end before you can activate them again.
privacyPolicy.contentRestriction: You may not use this feature to generate, induce, or disseminate any content that is illegal, harmful, infringing, discriminatory, or violates the privacy of others.
privacyPolicy.outputResponsibility: You are solely responsible for the consequences of any output generated using your custom parameters. LittleAIBox is not responsible for content produced after such high levels of user customization.
privacyPolicy.noSelling: We will not sell your personal information to any third party. However, to implement the core functions of this application, we will share some of your information with the following third-party services when necessary:
privacyPolicy.googleGemini: Your chat content (including text and the content of your uploaded files), AI parameters, and content used for intent analysis and long-text processing will be sent to Google's Gemini AI model for processing to generate intelligent responses.
privacyPolicy.pollinations: When your input is identified as an image generation request, the processed text prompt will be sent to the Pollinations.ai service to generate an image.
privacyPolicy.braveSearch: When you use "Search Mode," your query will be sent to Brave Search to obtain web search results.
privacyPolicy.resend: When you need email verification for registration or request a password reset, your email address will be shared with the Resend service to send you a verification code or reset link email.
privacyPolicy.cloudflare: All backend services for this application (including website hosting, database D1, key-value store KV, object storage R2) are built on the Cloudflare platform. Your data will pass through Cloudflare's servers during transmission and storage.
privacyPolicy.fingerprintjs: We use this technology to generate an anonymous browser ID for non-logged-in guests for usage limitation and security prevention.
privacyPolicy.googleOAuth: When you choose to log in with your Google account, we obtain your basic account information (email, username, avatar, etc.) through Google OAuth service to create or associate your account.
privacyPolicy.githubOAuth: When you choose to log in with your GitHub account, we obtain your basic account information (email, username, avatar, etc.) through GitHub OAuth service to create or associate your account.
privacyPolicy.storageLocation: Your data is stored on Cloudflare's globally distributed network.
privacyPolicy.guestData: Guest Data: Usage statistics data (recorded in Cloudflare KV) is valid for 24 hours and will be automatically deleted upon expiration. Chat history is stored in your local browser and is managed by you.
privacyPolicy.userData: Registered User Data: Your account information, chat history, and AI parameters will be stored until you request to delete your account.
privacyPolicy.securityMeasures: We take your data security very seriously. Your password is one-way encrypted using Salted Hashing; we cannot access your plaintext password. All data transmission is encrypted via the HTTPS protocol.
privacyPolicy.userRights: You have control over your personal information, and we guarantee you can exercise the following rights:
privacyPolicy.accessModify: You can log into your account at any time to access and modify your profile information (username, avatar) and custom API Key in the "Settings".
privacyPolicy.manageChats: You can rename, individually delete, or batch delete any of your chat conversations using the multi-select mode.
privacyPolicy.shareChats: You can create a public share link for one of your conversations. Please note that anyone with this link will be able to view the entire content of that conversation.
privacyPolicy.deleteAccount: If you wish to delete your account and all associated data, please contact us through our contact information. We will process it for you after verifying your identity.
privacyPolicy.clearLocalData: You can delete the locally stored session ID and guest chat history at any time by clearing your browser's localStorage.
privacyPolicy.policyChanges: We may revise this Privacy Policy from time to time. When significant changes occur, we will notify you in a prominent way within the application. Please review this policy periodically to ensure you are aware of the latest privacy practices.
privacyPolicy.contactUs: If you have any questions, comments, or suggestions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the following means:
